page.title: 19Halsway Nurseries
page.content: These{Nurseries}were once the walled garden and conservatory of {Halsway Manor.}Under glass Mr. and Mrs. Bushen grow their numerous plants from {seed,cuttings and bulbs.}The busiest time of the year is between March and June when when the{bedding {plants}are produced and the{Christmas {pot plants}are started. { Saturday}is{Taunton Market} day.The plants for sale are prepared on Friday and put into trays ready for loading into a van. During the winter this takes place early on Saturdays so that the plants are not chilled. Plants are also taken to many local flower shows. To help outside an Izexy, a mini-tractor is used. It has a plough, also lawn mower, crumbler and rotavator attachments and operates 2-wheel and 4-wheel drive.
